thread.title: DeMarcus Cousins picks up first technical with Pelicans, earns automatic suspension
thread.title_full: DeMarcus Cousins picks up first technical with Pelicans, earns automatic suspension

author: Joe Rodgers (joseph.rodgers@peformgroup.com)
title: DeMarcus Cousins picks up first technical with Pelicans, earns automatic suspension
text:
February 26, 2017 8:13pm EST February 26, 2017 8:13pm EST Basketball, NBA, News, Oklahoma City Thunder, English, DeMarcus Cousins, New Orleans Pelicans New team, but the same old problems exist for DeMarcus Cousins. DeMarcus Cousins (Getty Images) 
Updated at 8:13 p.m. ET 
Updated at 8:13 p.m. ET 
New team, but the same old problems exist for DeMarcus Cousins. 
The Pelicans' major trade deadline splash picked up his 18th technical foul of the season just 32 seconds into a game against the Thunder and will be suspended one game unless the foul is rescinded. New Orleans next plays Wednesday in Detroit, its fourth game since acquiring Cousins. 
Cousins was posting up Thunder center Steven Adams when the two became tangled. "Boogie" didn't like the fact Adams was reaching for the ball after the whistle and flung his arm in frustration, resulting in a double technical. defpensports: Boogie tech NBA TV NBA Basketball: Pelicans at Thunder https://t.co/zPvrdrxoYB pic.twitter.com/5WPZ3eu7i1 
Cousins now has 110 technicals to go along with 11 ejections in his career. Watch This
